paragraph.bullet: · Quick Move: Click Left Mouse Button
· Mouse Move: Hold Left Mouse Button
· Keyboard Move: Arrow Keys or WASD

· Teleporters: Click Left Mouse Button to go to a new location

paragraph.title: MOVEMENT
paragraph.bullet: Ability: Space bar while in the air to double jump
Web: Space bar while in the air to swing
Hulk: Space bar tab for low jump, Space Bar hold for high jump

paragraph.title: ACTION
paragraph.bullet: · Select Player: Click Left Mouse Button
· De-Select Player: Click Right Mouse Button
· Send Chat: Enter Key while any text is typed

paragraph.title: ACTION
paragraph.bullet: · Attack: Click Left Mouse Button on enemy
· Power Attack: Click Right Mouse Button on enemy
· Hero Up!: Click the Hero Up! Button or Click Both Mouse Buttons
· Objects: Click Left Mouse Button on an object to pick it up
Click Left Mouse Button on enemies to throw at them
Click Right Mouse Button anywhere to throw the object
· Powerup Containers: Click Left Mouse Button to

paragraph.title: STANDARD
paragraph.bullet: · Move Camera: Click and Hold Right Mouse Button
· Pause: Click Right Mouse Button on any hero

paragraph.title: PLAY MODE
paragraph.bullet: · Use Item: Hold Left Mouse Button on an object to capture it
...then move the object and release it to place it in that location
...or release it while moving the mouse to impart momentum

paragraph.title: PAUSE MODE
paragraph.bullet: · Use Item: Click Left Mouse Button on an object to grab it
...then Click Left Mouse Button again to place the object
